name: When They Took Me
description:
"When They Took Me" is a unique puzzle experience set in the test chambers of your captors. Learn the meaning of the symbols that surround you and escape!

Multiple Levels - One Simple Goal

Test your memory and patience as you find your way to the highlighted room.

Players will find themselves confined within a 3D puzzle consisting of many rooms. From within each room, the player must choose a wall to open, and then move into the next room. Upon entering the next room the level will change as determined by the symbol on the wall chosen.

Learn the Meanings of Each Symbol

Each symbol changes the level in a different way. Similar symbols will share a common color.

Avoid Danger

Avoid spikes, lasers, dead ends, … and more.

Find Out What Really Happened

Allow your imagination to interpret what has really happened given the loosely told story of "When They Took Me".
